description: Hot Pepper (Capsicum annuum 'Holy Mole') is a unique and amazing variety of chili pepper. A game changer in the world of heat and spice, this heirloom pepper packs the perfect amount of flavor and heat. A sultry combination of sweet and spicy, this pepper is one of a kind. Its dark, glossy red appearance and plump body make it visually appealing as well. The crunchy texture of this pepper is perfect for adding a kick to your recipes. With its immense health benefits, 'Holy Mole' is a must-have for any kitchen enthusiast. It's a great source of vitamins and minerals, is high in antioxidants, and is low in calories - making it a great choice for any health conscious individual.
